American Red Cross committee women
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: One women is sitting at a desk and four other women are standing next to the desk.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: American Red Cross; Interiors; Uniforms
Leverett, Mrs. Miles C.; Metcalf, Mrs. Harold M.; Peters, Mrs. Ralph; Smith, Mrs. Lyle J. Walsh, Mrs. M. K.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: See Oak Ridge Journal article of December 7, 1944. From left to right, Mrs. Lyle J. Smith, Mrs. M. K. Walsh, Mrs. Ralph Peters, Mrs. Miles C. Leverett, Mrs. Harold M. Metcalf.
